## Codebase Exploration Summary: Entourage Web

### Project Overview

**Entourage** is a marketing landing page for an AI-powered task extraction platform with Next.js 16, React 19, Tailwind CSS, and Clerk authentication. Current codebase: 3,034 lines of TypeScript across components and pages.

**Current branch**: `main` (feat/design-system work completed)

**Status**: Landing page largely complete with waitlist/authentication flow implemented. Two test failures preventing full test suite pass.

---

## Current State Analysis

### 1. Completed Work

#### Implemented Features

| Feature | Status | Files |
|---------|--------|-------|
| **Landing page sections** | Complete | Hero, TeamCredentialsSection, FlowSection, BentoFeatures, FAQ, SecondaryCTA |
| **Waitlist system** | Complete | WaitlistForm component, /api/waitlist POST route, useWaitlist hook |
| **Clerk authentication** | Complete | Sign-in page (/sign-in), middleware via proxy.ts |
| **Supabase integration** | Complete | Waitlist database inserts, server/client factories in src/lib/supabase/ |
| **Theme system** | Complete | ThemeProvider (light/dark mode), ThemeToggle component with Iconify icons |
| **Analytics** | Complete | PostHog integration, event tracking functions in src/lib/analytics |
| **Design system** | Complete | Plus corners, PlusCornerCard, Container, custom Button/Input/Label wrappers |
| **Section animations** | Complete | Navbar scale, TeamCredentials infinite scroll, FlowSection signal paths, task arrival pulse |

#### Key Sections Built

- **Hero**: Dashed border frame with plus corners, CTA button
- **TeamCredentialsSection**: Company logo carousel with CSS animations (speed configurable)
- **FlowSection**: SVG circuit diagram with animated signal paths, action badges, task arrival pulse
- **BentoFeatures**: Grid layout with IntegrationsCard (2x2), DataVaultCard (2x1), feature cards (1x1)
- **FAQ**: Accordion component with 4 questions, skeleton loading states, analytics tracking
- **SecondaryCTA**: Secondary call-to-action section

### 2. Git Status

**Modified files**:
- `src/components/ThemeToggle.test.tsx` - Test failures exist
- `src/providers/ThemeProvider.test.tsx` - Staged changes

**Untracked files**:
- `.claude/settings.json.backup.*` - Claude session backups (ignore these)
- `src/hooks/useHydrated.ts` - New hydration hook (untracked)
- `src/hooks/useWaitlist.ts` - New waitlist logic hook (untracked)
- `src/lib/types.ts` - Type definitions (untracked)

### 3. Test Status

**Test Results**: 43 passing, 2 failing (out of 45 tests)

#### Passing Test Suites
- API tests: 10/10 passing (waitlist route validation, database ops, email notifications)
- Unit tests: 33/35 passing across utilities, theme provider, button, WaitlistForm
- Component tests: Some warnings about act() wrapper in WaitlistForm tests

#### Failing Tests

**File**: `src/components/ThemeToggle.test.tsx` (2 failures)

1. **"shows moon icon in dark mode"** - Expects `data-icon="line-md:moon-loop"` but receives `data-icon="line-md:sun-rising-loop"`
2. **"has accessible label for dark mode"** - Expects `aria-label="Switch to light mode"` but receives `aria-label="Switch to dark mode"`

**Root cause**: The test setup appears to not properly initialize the dark theme state. The ThemeToggle component correctly implements the logic (line 28 in ThemeToggle.tsx shows conditional rendering based on theme), but the test's theme initialization is not persisting or resetting properly between tests.

---

├── flow-section/FlowSection.tsx
├── bento-features/BentoFeatures.tsx
├── secondary-cta/SecondaryCTA.tsx
└── faq/FAQ.tsx

layout/
├── header/Header.tsx
└── footer/Footer.tsx

ui/
├── Button.tsx (custom wrapper)
├── Input.tsx (custom wrapper)
├── Label.tsx (shadcn wrapper)
├── label.tsx (shadcn source)
├── PlusCorner.tsx (plus icon decoration)
├── PlusCornerCard.tsx (featured container)
├── Container.tsx (max-width wrapper)
├── accordion.tsx (shadcn component)
├── skeleton.tsx (shadcn loading state)

Utility Components:
├── Icon.tsx (Iconify wrapper)
├── Logo.tsx (Entourage logo)
├── ThemeToggle.tsx (light/dark toggle)

├── WaitlistForm.tsx (waitlist capture)

bento/
├── IntegrationsCard.tsx (10 integrations + center logo)
└── DataVaultCard.tsx (data vault feature card)
```

### App Routes (src/app)

```
app/
├── page.tsx (landing page - orchestrates all sections)
├── layout.tsx (root layout, fonts, providers)
├── globals.css (CSS variables, animations, utilities)

Authenticated Routes:
├── dashboard/page.tsx (signed-in users)
├── sign-in/[[...sign-in]]/page.tsx (Clerk sign-in)
├── careers/page.tsx (careers page - with modifications in git)
├── waitlist/page.tsx (waitlist signup page)

API Routes:
├── api/waitlist/route.ts (POST endpoint - saves to Supabase)

Metadata:
├── robots.ts

- `usePostHogIdentify.ts` - Analytics user identification

### Providers (src/providers)

- `ThemeProvider.tsx` - Light/dark mode context using useSyncExternalStore
- `PostHogProvider.tsx` - Analytics events tracking
- `index.ts` - Barrel exports

### Libraries (src/lib)

- `utils.ts` - `cn()` utility for classNames
- `analytics.ts` - PostHog event tracking functions
- `supabase/client.ts` - Browser Supabase client factory
- `supabase/server.ts` - Server Supabase client factory (with cookie handling)

### Test Files

**Unit tests**: 6 files with 35 tests
- `Button.test.tsx` - 9 tests (all passing)
- `ThemeToggle.test.tsx` - 6 tests (2 failing, 4 passing)
- `WaitlistForm.test.tsx` - 7 tests (passing, with act() warnings)
- `ThemeProvider.test.tsx` - 5 tests (all passing)
- `src/lib/utils.test.ts` - 8 tests (all passing)

**API tests**: 1 file with 10 tests
- `tests/api/waitlist.test.ts` - All 10 passing (validation, db ops, email notifications)

### Configuration Files

- `tsconfig.json` - TypeScript configuration
- `next.config.ts` - Next.js configuration
- `vitest.config.ts` - Test runner configuration
- `playwright.config.ts` - E2E test configuration
- `eslint.config.mjs` - Linting rules
- `tailwind.config.ts` - (not visible, assumed in .next or tsconfig paths)

**Files affected**:

**Status**: Planned but not implemented
